document_data.name: Hornung the Anarch
document_data.home: [[Oerth]]{{Cite card/Spellfire: Master the Magic/Artifacts|79/100|[[Hornung|Hornung the Anarch]]}}
document_data.formerhomes: [[Toril]]{{Cite card/AD&D Trading Cards/1993 rare set|22|[[Hornung|Hornung the Anarch]]}}
document_data.mainbody:
'''Hornung the Anarch''', known as the "king of the [[Wild mage|wild mages]]", was a prominent wild mage with multiple spells to his name. Originally from [[Toril]], a [[Wild_magic#Wild_surges|wild surge]] brought on by experimentation with ''[[wildwind]]'' sent him to the world of [[Oerth]].

At some point, Hornung was recruited into the [[Xaositects]] by one of his pupils, [[Quake Lavender]].
document_data.Spells:
: ''See also: [[:Category:Hornung's spells]]''
Hornung was credited with the creation of the following spells:
* ''[[Hornung's baneful deflector]]''
* ''[[Hornung's guess]]''
* ''[[Hornung's random dispatcher]]''
* ''[[Hornung's surge selector]]''
